items.title: Sea Salt & Vinegar Kettle Cooked Potato Chips 1.5 oz
items.description:
Product details

By now, you might know that we’re a family full of flavor fanatics. What can we say? We see Serrano peppers, sea salt, and vinegar and we’re just a batch of kettle cooked potato chips away from mixing them all together and doing our flavor-induced happy dance. (You know the one—we’ve all got one—whether it’s a subtle shoulder shimmy, a little aerial airplane action, or a mmm-cha-cha-cha!). So, in the spirit of seeing you do your happy dance, we went ahead and made these Kettle Cooked Sea Salt & Vinegar Potato Chips. That’s right. Go ahead and do your dance.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITON 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Chipotle BBQ Kettle Cooked Potato Chips 1.5 oz
items.description:
Product Details

Our carne asada daydreams taste a lot like beans, barbacoa, and chipotle BBQ. If you’re asking, “what more could you wish for?” Well, we took some serious time with that question too, and here’s where we landed: Kettle Cooked Chipotle BBQ Potato Chips. Just think—thick, crispy-cut kettle cooked potato chips that bring the subtle smoke of chipotle together with the delightful tang of BBQ sauce… Suddenly, we found ourselves resisting the impulse to lick our fingers, as we have done in barbecues past, so we made these chips so that our carne asada cravings can be met at last!

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITON 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Sea Salt Kettle Cooked Potato Chips 1.5 oz
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Potato heads unite! That’s right, we said “potato heads”—no, not like Mr. & Mrs. Potato Head—but rather the people who passionately pine for potatoes like our family does. In fact, we love potatoes so much that we made a simple potato chip with just the basics—avocado oil and sea salt—to enhance the naturally delectable crunch of potatoes, and to bring you: Kettle Cooked Sea Salt Potato Chips. So, all that’s left to do is enjoy them on a burger, add them to your sandwich, or snack on them as your heart desires! You really can’t go wrong with the basics here, but we have a feeling that you already knew as much, aficionado.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITON 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Grain Free Tortilla Chips Variety Pack
items.description:
Our family believes Juntos es Mejor (together is better), and we believe that includes food, too! So, we bundled up three of our Grain Free Tortilla Chips flavors (Sea Salt, Nacho, and Lime) into one Variety Pack for you and your family to enjoy. Stock up for all your snacking needs—from lunch bags to after-school snacks—with chips that are grain free, gluten free, dairy free, and made with avocado oil!

  • Grain Free, Gluten Free, Dairy Free, Non GMO, Soy Free
  • Made with avocado oil
  • Enjoy dipped in your favorite dips, topped with an assortment of toppings for nachos, or straight out of the bag!
  • 2 single-serving bags of each flavor: Sea Salt, Nacho, and Lime Grain Free Tortilla Chips

items.title: Kettle Cooked Potato Chips Variety Pack
items.description:
Our family believes Juntos es Mejor (together is better), and we believe that includes food, too! So, we bundled up three of our Kettle Cooked Potato Chips flavors (Sea Salt, Chipotle BBQ, and Sea Salt & Vinegar with a hint of Serrano) into one Variety Pack for a mix of flavors so good, you’ll have snacks for days! All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free, soy free, and made with avocado oil. 

  • Gluten Free, Non GMO, Dairy Free, and Soy Free
  • Made with avocado oil
  • Enjoy straight out of the bag, drenched in hot sauce, or paired with your favorites like sandwiches & burgers
  • 2 single-serving bags of each flavor: Sea Salt, Sea Salt and Vinegar with a hint of Serrano, and Chipotle BBQ Kettle Cooked Potato Chips

items.title: Backyard Asada Bundles - "All that and two bags of Maíz Totopos Corn Tortilla Chips!"
items.description:
When the weather gets warmer, our family’s favorite way to gather is at a backyard carne asada. In our culture, a backyard asada is a gathering similar to a backyard barbecue! We soak in the summer sun and enjoy music, drinks, and conversation with loved ones amidst the smoky aromas of delicious foods cooking on the grill. We’ve created these Backyard Asada Bundles in celebration of our Mexican-American culture and to make it that much easier for you to gather with your loved ones.

Our Backyard Asada Bundles come with:

  • Mild Taco Seasoning
  • Spicy Taco Seasoning
  • Carnitas Slow Cooker Seasoning
  • Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice
  • Traditional Botana Sauce
  • Jalapeno Botana Sauce
  • Habanero Botana Sauce
  • Chamoy Botana Sauce
  • Artisan-made Siete Serape Blanket (Blanket may vary in color)

Our Potato Chips Option Also includes:

  • Kettle Cooked Chipotle BBQ Potato Chips
  • Kettle Cooked Sea Salt & Vinegar Potato Chips
  • Refried Pinto Beans
  • Refried Ranchero Beans

Our Maíz Totopos Option Also includes:

  • Maíz Blue Corn Totopos
  • Maíz Lime Totopos
  • Charro Beans
  • Refried Black Beans

variants.title: "All that and two bags of Maíz Totopos Corn Tortilla Chips!"
"All that and two bags of Kettle Cooked Potato Chips!"

items.title: Almond Flour Tortilla 20ct
items.description:
Siete Almond Flour Tortillas taste like a buttery flour tortilla. Warm them for a few seconds on a skillet or in the microwave, and you'll understand why people are flipping out over these things. Load them with salsa, meat, cheese, veggies, etc. to bring a healthy and modern flair to traditional Mexican fare.

Our grain free tortillas are approximately 6'' in diameter

items.title: Maíz Blue Corn Totopos Tortilla Chips 7.5oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
With our mission to have something for everyone and there being so many different types of corn, we thought, “why not make a blue corn tortilla chip?” It looks like the medianoche night sky and tastes like a dream! So, once we sourced delicious avocado oil & organic blue corn kernels, it was really just a chip off the old block.  Learn More.

Now Available in a Mix Pack!

Sold out

items.title: Maíz Lime Totopos Corn Tortilla Chips 7.5oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
The difference between a good tortilla chip and a great tortilla chip exists on a fine lime. And, even if that’s not entirely true, we took that to heart and added a squeeze of zesty lime to these tortilla chips anyways. Made with some of our favorite heritage ingredients, like organic yellow and white corn, avocado oil, and lime, they’re so crunchy and delicious that we can’t help but refill our bowls with these chips, lime after lime.  Learn more.

Now Available in a Mix Pack!

Sold out

items.title: Maíz Sea Salt Totopos Corn Tortilla Chips 7.5oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
Corn is an ingredient that's been used throughout our culture for ages. Which is why our family thinks of it as a “salt of the earth” ingredient, right up there with avocado, and—well, salt, for that matter. So we put all three of these ingredients together—organic white and yellow corn, avocado oil, and sea salt—and got these delicious and crunchy corn tortilla chips. With the perfect ratio of chip to salt, there’s nothing left to be salty about—except, maybe, when you run out…Learn more.

Now Available in a Mix Pack!

Sold out

items.title: Maíz Totopos Corn Tortilla Chips Mix - 3 Bags
items.description:
When our family thinks of restaurant-style corn tortilla chips, we think of warm, salted chips in a bowl big enough to feed the whole table. But conversation and salsa can make tortilla chips disappear instantly (guac-ward)! We sourced organic corn and delicious avocado oil to create and share these chips with you, so refilling the bowl is easy. As corny as it sounds, they taste pretty a-maiz-ing, too.

Learn More!

items.title: Botana Sauce Mix Pack 10.00% Off Auto renew
items.description:
What’s Botana Sauce, you may ask? Our Botana Sauces are versatile, all-purpose sauces filled with heritage-inspired flavor and made with real ingredients. We use them on snacks as well as meals—everything, really! (“Everything” as in: enchiladas, papitas preparadas, grilled vegetables, salad dressings, chili, tacos, burgers, fruit cups, sorbets…you get the gist.) What’s more? They’re in portable, adorable squeezy bottles.

Each order contains one bottle of each our new Botana Sauces!!

Chamoy:  Our Chamoy Botana Sauce is a sweet and tangy blend of fruits and peppers. We used chiles to give it a hint of spice and its vibrant shade of red, dates for just the right amount of sweetness, and limes & hibiscus for tang—just like the chamoy we grew up eating! Chamoy is a big part of Mexican-American food culture. It’s not only undeniably delicious, but it’s extremely versatile and used as a sauce, condiment, and dip. (Some of us even call it “the salsa of snacks!”) In our hometown of Laredo, you can find snack shops at every corner that feature chamoy on everything—from fruit cups, sorbets, and raspas, to pickles, papitas preparadas, and assorted gummy candies. Our familia likes adding it to cocktail rims and nut mixes, too!

Jalapeño:  Our Jalapeño Botana Sauce is a versatile, medium-spiced sauce with a hint of sweetness and a delicious garlic-y finish. It’s made using jalapeños, avocado oil, apple cider vinegar, and dates which makes it slightly spicy, creamy, and lightly sweet. This way you can use it to top anything, like tacos, enchiladas, chicken, grilled veggies…the list goes on. We also love serving this sauce with chips or drizzling it atop all of our favorite salty snacks! So, when we say, “This botana sauce is like your nosey tía in the best way…jalap-eño business,” we’ll only be partially kidding.

Habanero:  Our Habanero Botana Sauce is a medium-hot, versatile sauce that gets its sweetness from dates and its heat from habanero and guajillo peppers. We made it with carrots, apple cider vinegar, dates, and habanero peppers—which makes it the perfect all-purpose sauce. Use our Habanero Botana Sauce to: top your favorite tacos, quesadillas, and chicken wings; drizzle atop chips and salty snacks; and serve with eggs, proteins, and salads! In fact, if you try this and decide that you can ‘nero enjoy a snack or meal without it…well, we can relate to that. It’s what we call, “love at first spice.”

Traditional:  Our Traditional Botana Sauce is a mildly-spiced, tangy, and versatile sauce made with garlic, pequin peppers & guajillo peppers.  Stroll into any casual restaurant in Mexico and you'll find a sauce like this on the table.  It’s just the thing for serving with papitas preparadas, salty snacks & chips, chicken wings, eggs, and tacos. Plus, it tastes great drizzled atop dishes like enchiladas & tostadas and mixed into pots of chili!  Enjoy it on your favorite meals and snacks alike, and you’re bound to enjoy every single bite.

items.title: Sea Salt Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz - 6 Bags -
items.description:
NEED IT TODAY?

Need it fast? Get same-day delivery of Siete products from Whole Foods.

Available in select markets where Whole Foods delivers.

PRODUCT DETAILS

These should have been named Tortilla Chips: The Director's Cut. Our sister, Vero, made tortilla chips without any grains that taste better than any regular tortilla chip you've ever eaten. We were skeptical at first, too, but they're smooth and crispy and light and refreshing. Right when they pop out the oven, we make it rain with sea salt, so you can eat them straight out of the bag or with your favorite dip or salsa.

items.title: 1 oz Tortilla Chips Mix Pack - 24 bags
items.description:
• Lime - 6 bags
  • Sea Salt - 6 bags 
  • Nacho - 4 bags 
  • Ranch - 4 bags
  • Fuego - 4 bags

items.title: Nacho Grain Free Tortilla Chips 1 oz - 24 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Sometimes we use “nacho” in jest like “these are nacho average chips,” but the flavor on these chips is no joke. We think of the 1oz Nacho chips as the smaller (but just as feisty) flavor-twin to the 4 oz Nacho (#twinning!). Which makes them the youngest sibling to original, subtler 5 oz Nacho Chips. Served in a smaller, crunchier triangles, and covered in our flavorful, dairy free seasoning blend, the 1oz Nacho is the 4oz Nacho’s partner in crime in breaking all the rules the original would have gotten in trouble for.

This order contains 24 bags of 1 oz chips.

items.title: Lime Grain Free Tortilla Chips 1 oz - 24 bags
items.description:
NEED IT TODAY?

Need it fast? Get same-day delivery of Siete products from Whole Foods.

SHOP WHOLE FOODS DELIVERY

Available in select markets where Whole Foods delivers.

PRODUCT DETAILS

Everyone wants to go to paradise, but not everyone can get there. Thankfully, a bite of our lime infused chips will teleport a palm tree and a straw hat to your location. (Note: this was not replicable outside of our trip to the beach.) And even if they don't, the refreshing sensation of our tart lime seasoning will at least brighten your day. Our lime chips provide the ultimate tailgate or potluck one-up, as they are both the ideal partner to any guacamole and an undeniably zesty solo act.

items.title: Ranch Grain Free Tortilla Chips 1 oz - 24 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

In Texas, ranches are big deals, but ranch dressing is an even bigger deal. Ranch is the duct tape solution to every food problem. Pizza bland? Ranch. Salad dry? Ranch. Snack tray boring? Ranch. Ice cream too cold? No comment. Skin a little burnt? Stop it already, we said food problem! In celebration of ranch dressing's venerated place in the history of fine snacking, we created a dairy free (yes way!) seasoning blend of garlic, dill, parsley, and a little bit of magic that delivers the best elements of the classic dip. Giddyup, compadres!

items.title: Fuego Grain Free Tortilla Chips 1 oz - 24 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

If you love spice so much that you want to marry it, then you know that sublime equilibrium when your mouth is on fire, and the only way to put out that fire is to keep adding more fire. If you're on a never-ending quest for that special moment, then these Fuego chips will be your new jam. We wrapped these chips in a Mexican blanket of our favorite chili peppers including Jalapeño and Habanero.

items.title: Sea Salt Grain Free Tortilla Chips 1 oz - 24 bags
items.description:
NEED IT TODAY?

Need it fast? Get same-day delivery of Siete products from Whole Foods.

SHOP WHOLE FOODS DELIVERY

Available in select markets where Whole Foods delivers.

PRODUCT DETAILS

These should have been named Tortilla Chips: The Director's Cut. Our sister, Vero, made tortilla chips without any grains that taste better than any regular tortilla chip you've ever eaten. We were skeptical at first, too, but they're smooth and crispy and light and refreshing. Right when they pop out the oven, we make it rain with sea salt, so you can eat them straight out of the bag or with your favorite dip or salsa.

items.title: The Siete Table
items.description: Throughout the years, our family has collected recipes that span every occasion and meal, like our Mom’s special Sunday breakfasts, neighborhood carne asadas, and traditional holiday dishes. Now, we’ve poured it ALL into the pages of our first family cookbook: THE SIETE TABLE!

items.title: Vegan Beans Mix - 12 Cans 10.00% Off Auto renew
items.description: WARNING: This product is for Recharge Subscriptions use only, do not publish or delete this product. Customers will not see this message.

items.title: Gift Card - $50.00
items.description:
A non-exhaustive list of reasons you might share a Siete gift card with someone:

  • You know they love Siete, but you can't remember exactly which products they like. Was it Churros? Taco Shells? Almond Flour Tortillas? Potato Chips?!
  • You know someone who's grain free, gluten free, dairy free, or vegan, and—above all else—loves tacos.
  • You've got a pal who's been wanting to try Siete, but doesn't live within a country mile of grocery store that stocks Siete.
  • You want to support someone on their journey to health by spicing up their life with better for you Mexican-American food. 
  • You've got good taste in gift-giving and generally speaking. Being told "You're the chip!" is your idea of the ideal compliment you'd get in response to this gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain redemption instructions.

items.title: Vegan Beans Mix - 12 Cans
items.description:
Have you BEAN thinking about trying our beans? You’re in the right place (as in: it’s meant to bean)! With this Variety 12-pk, you can get a taste of all four of our delicious Vegan Beans. We’ve included three cans of our smooth and delicious refried beans in Pinto, Black, and Ranchero, as well as our savory and brothy, whole-bean offering of Charro Beans! Perfect for all your taco nights, quick breakfast tacos, tostadas, enchiladas, and more.

**Order contains 3 cans of each flavor (12 total)

items.title: Vegan Ranchero Refried Beans - 12 Cans
items.description: Having grown up in South Texas, our family enjoys adding tomatoes, onions, and peppers to our refried beans—a style better known as, “Ranchero-Style.” Today, we’ve made our own smooth and delicious Vegan Refried Ranchero Beans with this heritage-inspired flavor so everyone can dig in! Campfire and worn-in cowboy boots not required when eating or serving, but if you take your first bite and feel like tippin’ your hat off to some good beans, we’ll take that as a job well done. Enjoy these in tacos, atop tostadas, on breakfast plates, and alongside rice!

items.title: Vegan Charro Beans - 12 Cans
items.description: Our family loves beans, and one of our favorite ways to enjoy them is a whole-bean style (as opposed to refried!) called, “Frijoles Charros,” or “Charro Beans.” Our Vegan Charro Beans are tender and simmered in a flavorful broth seasoned with onion, garlic, tomato and paprika. We also added a touch of pickled jalapeño to give them a delightful and mild bite of spice. Enjoy them warmed, alongside a fresh stack of tortillas, served with carne asada, or paired with rice! Be warned, however, even as a side, they may just steal the show.

items.title: Beans & Spice (and everything nice!) Bundle
items.description:
We created this bundle for those whose favorite night of the week includes heritage-inspired flavors, tasty fillings, and a whole lot of beans! We’ve included one can of each of our Vegan Beans as well as two packets of each of our heritage-inspired seasonings. This way you’ve got yourself all the makings you need for bean dips, taco fillings, and many meals full of beans, spice, and everything nice!

Our Beans & Spice (and everything nice!) Bundle includes:

  • 1 Vegan Refried Pinto Bean
  • 1 Vegan Refried Black Bean
  • 1 Vegan Refried Ranchero Bean
  • 1 Vegan Charro Bean
  • 2 Mild Taco Seasoning
  • 2 Spicy Taco Seasoning
  • 2 Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice
  • 2 Carnitas Slow Cooker Seasoning

items.title: Hard Shell Bean Taco Bundle
items.description:
Inspired by the tacos we enjoyed at restaurants, on crispy taco platters, and the ones we stuff in crunchy wraps, this Hard Shell Taco Bundle features our Grain Free Taco Shells along with our family’s Taco Tuesday essentials AND our new beans! We created this bundle for those who want a little extra crunch at their Taco Night and those whose favorite tacos involve a crisp exterior and a pile of fresh lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese! Sound like you? Then this Hard Shell Taco Bundle’s already got your name on it!

Includes:
2 taco shell
2 vegan refried beans (Black, Pinto)
2 seasonings (mild, spicy)

items.title: Bean Taco Bundle
items.description:
Inspired by the tacos our family grew up eating, this Taco Bundle features our Grain Free Almond Flour Tortillas along with our family’s Taco Tuesday essentials AND our new beans! We created this bundle—featuring our basic taco necessities—for all those who love Taco Night and those who enjoy breakfast tacos every morning, fajita tacos for lunch, and pirata tacos for dinner. Sound familiar? Then this Taco Bundle is just for you! 
 Includes:

• 2 almond flour tortilla packs
• 2 vegan refried beans (Black, Pinto)
• 2 seasonings (mild, spicy)

items.title: Bundle of Joy
items.description:
¡Felicidades! The family tree is growing, and we are excited to help you celebrate your bundle of joy with this Bundle of Joy. For our love of curling up with a good bedtime story, we’ve packed up 2 custom falsa blankets and a children’s book. And for our love of—well—food, we’ve also included our Siete Grain Free Cookies and an avocado baby rattle. Share with expecting parents, new babies, and growing families!
  • Siete Grain Free Cookies (2 Chocolate, 2 Shortbread)
    • Gluten free, dairy free, and bite-sized
    • Perfect for dunking in milk, eating straight out of the bag, topping scoops of ice cream
    • Made with almond flour, avocado oil, and coconut sugar

  • “A Little Bit of This, and A Little Bit of That” Children’s Book:

    • Explore what our Siete family calls "The Hyphen" and the “little bit of this and the little bit of that” that makes up our unique and special identities

  •  Woven Avocado Baby Rattle
    • Handmade with cotton and natural materials
    • Artisan-made using crochet and knitting techniques
    • Every purchase of this rattle supports safe, empowering workspaces for women practicing knitting

  • 2 Custom Siete Falsa Blankets
    • Vibrant red, yellow, and blue
    • 100% acrylic

items.title: 4 oz Tortilla Chip Mix Pack - 8 bags
items.description: A sampler pack of 8 bags of our Bold Flavor 4oz Grain Free Tortilla Chips. Includes 2 bags of Fuego, Ranch, Nacho and Jalapeño Lime.

items.title: Vegan Refried Pinto Beans - 1 Can
items.description: Beans have a special place at our table and a nostalgic place in our hearts. We remember being greeted by the savory aroma from a fresh pot of frijoles at our grandma’s house, scooping heaping servings onto our plates with fajitas and tortillas at carne asadas, and enjoying fresh bean and egg tacos in the mornings! Beans are a staple in our household and a significant part of our heritage. Made with simple ingredients like avocado oil and organic beans, we’re sharing our delicious Vegan Refried Pinto Beans so they can be at the heart of your table, too.

items.title: Vegan Refried Black Beans - 1 Can
items.description: Beans are a “must-serve” at our table and a staple of our Mexican-American heritage. Growing up, they were always stockpiled in our pantry, saved in our fridge for later, and served with pretty much every meal. For that reason, beans still have a special place at our table today. Which is why we’ve made our own Vegan Refried Black Beans using nourishing ingredients like organic beans and avocado oil! Perfect for dipping, scooping, and adding some mighty rich flavor and Santana-smooth texture to just about anything—from tostadas and tamales to nachos and tortillas. Can we get a “cool beans!?”

items.title: Enchilada Sauce Mix Pack: 2 Red, 2 Green
items.description:
NEED IT TODAY?

Need it fast? Get same-day delivery of Siete products from Whole Foods.

SHOP WHOLE FOODS DELIVERY

Available in select markets where Whole Foods delivers.

PRODUCT DETAILS

Sample our new enchilada sauces by trying both flavors. Order includes 2 jars of Red and 2 jars of Green.

items.title: Mexican Wedding Cookies - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Dearly Beloveds, we’re gathered here today to celebrate a food that holds a special place in our family’s hearts, (and on the dessert table, amongst the spread of colorful homemade sweets for every quinceañera, anniversary, & special occasion): the Mexican wedding cookie! We have many memories of cooking hundreds—hundreds!—of these in the kitchen with our Grandma Campos before each of our siblings’ weddings. Later, after embarking on our journey to health, these were one of the first sweets we recreated in a grain free and dairy free version, so we could continue to make—and bake—the beautiful memories that accompany these delicious cookies. Our Abuela Approved Grain Free Mexican Wedding Cookies are made from a blend of almond flour, pecans, powdered sugar, and cinnamon for all to enjoy. Sounds pretty dreamy, right? (OOP! Here’s our cue, the moment we’ve all been waiting for:) You may now eat the cookie.

Available in a resealable bag, which may mean that stealing from the “cookie jar” just got a whole lot easier.

items.title: Vegan Refried Pinto Beans - 12 Cans
items.description: Beans have a special place at our table and a nostalgic place in our hearts. We remember being greeted by the savory aroma from a fresh pot of frijoles at our grandma’s house, scooping heaping servings onto our plates with fajitas and tortillas at carne asadas, and enjoying fresh bean and egg tacos in the mornings! Beans are a staple in our household and a significant part of our heritage. Made with simple ingredients like avocado oil and organic beans, we’re sharing our delicious Vegan Refried Pinto Beans so they can be at the heart of your table, too.

items.description: Beans are a “must-serve” at our table and a staple of our Mexican-American heritage. Growing up, they were always stockpiled in our pantry, saved in our fridge for later, and served with pretty much every meal. For that reason, beans still have a special place at our table today. Which is why we’ve made our own Vegan Refried Black Beans using nourishing ingredients like organic beans and avocado oil! Perfect for dipping, scooping, and adding some mighty rich flavor and Santana-smooth texture to just about anything—from tostadas and tamales to nachos and tortillas. Can we get a “cool beans!?”

items.title: Mix Pack Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

This Siete mix pack consists of all of Kettle Cooked Potato Chips flavors (2x Queso, Sea Salt, Sea Salt & Vinegar, Fuego, Chipotle BBQ), 6 total!

We’ve doubled-down on the delectable simplicity of the potato by kettle cooking it in avocado oil, sprinkling on some of our favorite heritage-inspired flavors, and—behold: thick, crunchy, and delicious Mexican style potato chips. Available in Sea Salt, Fuego, Chipotle BBQ, Queso, Chile Lime and Sea Salt and Vinegar with Hint of Serrano. All non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free. 

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Chile Lime Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 Bags
items.description:
Product Details

We love chile lime. Chile lime on mangos, chile lime in tacos, chile lime dulces... It’s a finger-lickin’ flavor combo that our family likes to add to foods—including adding to crispy papitas—to give them a little zing! Made with avocado oil, red chile, and lime, these Kettle Cooked Chile Lime Potato Chips bring you the type of flavor you only experience when you use your third and final genie’s wish to “experience the most delicious chile lime flavor in the world!”...or something like that, anyways.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Cross Stitch Hat - White
items.description: A cap that goes with anything! White Cross Stitch and Gold Cross Stitch available!

items.title: Nacho Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

We searched all of Mexico to find the perfect nacho tree, and then we picked its tantalizing fruit for our Siete Nacho Tortilla Chips. Seriously, though, let's take a second to salute Ignacio "Nacho" Anaya, inventor of the eponymous Tex-Mex staple. Nacho, you rock!

At Siete, we're kinda like an Olympic gymnast who is going for gold, we like our routines to have a high degree of difficulty, so we made our delicious cheesy Nacho flavoring without using any dairy.

For the seasoning blend, we spent hours in the kitchen getting the ratios just right and the final product is the perfect mixture of tangy, spicy, and cheesy. Smoked serrano and roasted garlic underlie the sophisticated savory flavor that provides the chips with an addictive depth.

items.title: Siete X Frank Green Ceramic Thermos Duo (12 oz and 20 oz)
items.description:
Picture this: It’s 6am, you’ve just woken up, and it’s time to make the kids’ lunch before rushing out the door. But first, you need fuel! You grab your favorite insulated Siete thermos and pour yourself a piping-hot cup of coffee (it’s gotta last you through the morning madness, after all). And then, before you know it, it’s time to run out the door to make it to school on time. You grab your Siete thermos and it fits perfectly into your cup holder in the car. Fast forward: The kids are dropped off at school and you finally can enjoy your *still hot* coffee. Mmm!

Frank Green Facts:

• Offsets the environmental impact in as little as 15 uses

• Fully recyclable

• Learn more about Frank Green

items.title: Queso Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 Bags
items.description:
Product Details

Chili con queso, salsa con queso, macaroni con queso (yes, it's a thing and it's absolutely delicious), queso con queso… Noticing any patterns here? We’re crazy about queso! And since our family concocted a dairy free queso seasoning that tastes remarkably like the real stuff, we got a little jiggy with it and started sprinkling it on foods left and right. Most notably, we added it to a batch of potato chips, freshly kettle cooked in avocado oil, and ended up with these amazing Kettle Cooked Queso Potato Chips. It might sound cheesy, but our life will never be the same, livin’ la vida queso.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Carbon Neutral Order - Default Title
Shareable Snacks Bundle
items.description:
Product Details

We make foods that we enjoy eating. (Sometimes we think this goes without saying, but just in case it isn't, we're just sayin.') In fact, we enjoy them so much that sometimes our love for our products might better be described as a borderline-obession (we're a very passionate bunch, after all). Why do we bring this up? Because we have a confession: sometimes our love for our foods is so great that we are faced with the question: to share or not to share?

No, we are not above stashing our Kettle Cooked Fuego Potato Chips on the highest shelf of the pantry, where others won't find it, or even doing as a chipmunk does and stuffing the last few Grain Free Churro Strips in our mouth before snack-searching hands come around. Are we proud of these moments? No. But can you relate?

Here to help is our Shareable Snacks Bundle, where there is something for everyone, and lots to go around! Because, at the end of the day, our snacks were made for sharing--even when it's easier said than done.

Bundle includes 1 bag each of:

  • Churro Strips
  • Fuego Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
  • Sea Salt Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
  • Sea Salt & Vinegar Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
  • Chipotle BBQ Kettle Cooked Potato Chips
  • Jalapeño Lime Tortilla Chips (4oz bag)
  • Ranch Tortilla Chips (4oz bag)
  • Nacho Tortilla Chips (4oz bag)

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: How It Started & How It's Going Bundle
items.description:
Product Details

It feels like it was just yesterday that our sister Veronica debuted her delicious tortillas made from almond flour to our family after we all went grain free together. And, while every experience eating one of her tortillas is as enjoyable as the first time, it's actually been years, and a lot has happened since that glorious day! Since then, we've been busy in the kitchen perfecting more heritage-inspired foods to bring to life nostalgic foods using simple, clean ingredients—so everyone can enjoy! We created this bundle as an homage to the first foods our Siete family made, and as an exciting debut of some of our newest creations! It's our honor and our pleasure to offer to you them here and now, so that you and your family can gather and experience the foods that brings our familia together.

What's included in this bundle:

  • 3 Almond Flour Tortilla
  • 3 Cassava Flour Tortilla
  • 1 Sea Salt Tortilla Chips 5oz
  • 1 Lime Tortilla Chips 5oz
  • 1 Nacho Tortilla Chips 4oz
  • 1 SS + Vinegar Potato Chips 5oz
  • 1 Fuego Potato Chips 5oz
  • 1 Sea Salt Potato Chips 5oz
  • 1 Churros 5oz

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Mix Pack Cookies - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Over the past few months, we’ve spent a lot of time in the kitchen, mixing almond flour, coconut oil, and avocado oil to bring you three (that’s right, THREE) different, delicious cookies that are all: grain free, gluten free, dairy free, vegan, and non GMO. If you think this is exciting, just wait until you hear the flavors: Grain Free Mexican Chocolate, Grain Free Mexican Shortbread, and Grain Free Mexican Wedding Cookies.

items.title: Mexican Shortbread Cookies - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Mexican shortbread cookies, also known as hojarascas, or pan de polvo, are sweet, crunchy, delicious cookies that our family makes (and eats!) by the dozens. Fond are our memories of bringing these cookies home from the local bakery in Laredo, and always having them out on the table, or in our cookie jars. Our grain free versions of these nostalgic cookies are thoughtfully baked to perfection, Abuela Approved, and quite possibly the next best thing since the simple pleasure of playing in fallen leaves. But—unlike cookies—we never want to put words in your mouth. Instead, we’ll just tell you that these Grain Free Mexican Shortbread Cookies are made from a lightly sweetened blend of almond flour and a dash of cinnamon..

items.title: Mexican Chocolate Cookies - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Inspired by the warm, frothy, nostalgic memories of our childhood sipping Mexican hot chocolate, we bring you Grain Free Mexican Chocolate Cookies. Made with a blend of almond flour, cocoa, a dash of cinnamon, and phantom hot-chocolate-mustaches (okay, that’s not really as much an ingredient as the spirit and heart of these cookies, but you get the idea), these crunchy, rich chocolate cookies take us back. Imagine: the smell of buñuelos, pan dulce, conchas, and arroz con leche all wafting together from the kitchen, where grandma is stirring a huge pot of melted chocolate and cinnamon sticks. Just as she ladled out her hot chocolate into smaller mugs for her loved ones to sip on, we share these bite-size, Abuela Approved chocolate cookies, for you and your family to snack on.

items.title: Chipotle BBQ Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Our carne asada daydreams taste a lot like beans, barbacoa, and chipotle BBQ. If you’re asking, “what more could you wish for?” Well, we took some serious time with that question too, and here’s where we landed: Kettle Cooked Chipotle BBQ Potato Chips. Just think—thick, crispy-cut kettle cooked potato chips that bring the subtle smoke of chipotle together with the delightful tang of BBQ sauce… Suddenly, we found ourselves resisting the impulse to lick our fingers, as we have done in barbecues past, so we made these chips so that our carne asada cravings can be met at last!

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Fuego Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Hot potato, hot potato, who’s got the hot potato? If you’ve got the fuego papitas, then you do! Our Kettle Cooked Fuego Potato Chips deliver that can't-get-enough old school crunch with bold fuego flavor. How’s that, you ask? Well, our potato chips are cooked in avocado oil, and then tossed in our piquant blend of spices like chile, tomato, jalapeño, and garlic. Is this the kind of flavor-meets-crunch innovation that they call “too hot to handle?” Psh, we’ll leave that for you to decide, hot potato.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

For California Customers click here for Proposition 65 warning

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Sea Salt & Vinegar Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

By now, you might know that we’re a family full of flavor fanatics. What can we say? We see Serrano peppers, sea salt, and vinegar and we’re just a batch of kettle cooked potato chips away from mixing them all together and doing our flavor-induced happy dance. (You know the one—we’ve all got one—whether it’s a subtle shoulder shimmy, a little aerial airplane action, or a mmm-cha-cha-cha!). So, in the spirit of seeing you do your happy dance, we went ahead and made these Kettle Cooked Sea Salt & Vinegar Potato Chips. That’s right. Go ahead and do your dance.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Sea Salt Kettle Cooked Potato Chips - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Potato heads unite! That’s right, we said “potato heads”—no, not like Mr. & Mrs. Potato Head—but rather the people who passionately pine for potatoes like our family does. In fact, we love potatoes so much that we made a simple potato chip with just the basics—avocado oil and sea salt—to enhance the naturally delectable crunch of potatoes, and to bring you: Kettle Cooked Sea Salt Potato Chips. So, all that’s left to do is enjoy them on a burger, add them to your sandwich, or snack on them as your heart desires! You really can’t go wrong with the basics here, but we have a feeling that you already knew as much, aficionado.

All of our delicious Kettle Cooked Potato Chips are also non GMO, dairy free, gluten free and soy free.

FOR CALIFORNIA CUSTOMERS CLICK HERE FOR PROPOSITION 65 WARNING

WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including acrylamide, which are known to the State of California to cause cancer. Acrylamide is a chemical that can form in some foods during high-temperature cooking processes, such as frying, roasting, and baking. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food.

items.title: Seasoning Mix: Carnitas, Chorizo, Mild, Spicy - 8 pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

2 pouches of each of our seasonings, including Spicy, Mild, Chorizo and Carnita. A total of 8 seasoning packs!

items.title: Carnitas and Chorizo Seasonings Mix Pack  - 6 Pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Want to try both of our new seasonings? Now you can get both so sharing is even easier. Contains 3 packs of Carnitas Slow Cooker Spice and 3 packs of Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice.

items.title: Chorizo Seasoning Skillet Cooking Spice- 6 Pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Our Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice is inspired by our family’s first chorizo pioneers, and the heart and soul they put into creating a dish for the family to gather around and enjoy. You see, chorizo was a staple in our house growing up. Our mom, Aida, used to make homemade chorizo con huevo and serve it with tortillas fresh off the comal. And just as our Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice was inspired by Aida, her delicious chorizo recipe was inspired by memories of her mother, our Grandma Campos—sifting, sautéingand seasoning pork with spices straight from her kitchen cupboard to get it juuuust right! Like grandmother, like mother, like daughter, right? Made from simple ingredients apple cider vinegar, chile, and garlic (and none of the kitchen-cabinet guesswork), you can enjoy the flavor of chorizo in traditional dishes like chorizo con huevo or papas con chorizo. Simply add our all-in-one Chorizo Skillet Cooking Spice to potatoes, ground proteins, minced mushrooms, tofu or whatever your heart dreams, really!

items.title: Carnitas Seasoning Slow Cooker Spice - 6 Pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

For every lonely tortilla out there, somewhere, there’s a crockpot, filled with tender-yet-simultaneously-and-magically-crispy protein, just waiting for the day to complete one another. Wow, didn’t mean to get emotional on you—it’s just that this somehow feels like the greatest love story we’ve heard in a long time! That, or maybe all this talk of carnitas is just making us a little hungry…. Inspired by family memories of our Grandma Campos making a carnitas-style dish, where she cooked pork in the oven then crisped it in a pan with seasonings from her cupboard, we’re delighted to bring you this delicious heritage-inspired seasoning without the measure-it-out guesswork. With flavor so bold, you’d never guess that the ingredients are as simple as dates, garlic, onion, citrus, and cumin. In fact, our Carnitas Slow Cooker Spice is an all-in-one seasoning, so there’s no need to add much more than a little oil, and the veggie or protein of choice—pork, chicken, jackfruit, or otherwise. Easy as that!

items.title: Dog Collar - S
items.description: What’s pawsitively essential in making dog-walking a little less ruff? That’s right! You guessed it (was it the puns or the picture that did it?)—a leash! ‘Round here, we love our pups as much as...well, anything! So we’ve taken special care to create a stylish Siete leash for your next stroll. Not only are these collars made from recycled nylon, but just wait until you see how good it looks on your dog...WOOF!

items.title: Churro Strips 5 oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

“Churros...” Even the name melts in our mouth as we roll our tongues to say it! Inspired by trips to the plaza in Mexico on Saturday afternoons, walking from vendor to vendor under vibrant papel picado and piñatas, with newspaper-wrapped churros in hand, we made these Grain Free Churro Strips! Not only are they extremely delicious, but they’re also made with simple ingredients like cassava flour, coconut sugar, cinnamon, and vanilla bean powder, so everyone can enjoy. All that’s left for you to decide is whether or not to pair with cajeta, dip in hot chocolate, or savor straight from the bag!

items.title: Taco Seasoning Mix Pack - 3 Mild + 3 Spicy
items.description:

items.title: Slouchy V-Neck - S
items.description:
From our family to you, a shirt that’s so soft and comfy that you can’t help but imagine that it was made for you, just like all those times you dreamt about being loving swaddled in a tortilla… Please note that although this shirt is edible-level comfy, it is not, in fact, meant to be eaten. We’ve got some pretty delicious Grain Free Tortilla Chips for that.

**Women's Sizing
Beca is wearing size: Small.

items.title: Cassava Flour Tortillas - 6 Packs
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Our Cassava Tortillas will knock your calcetínes off! They taste like a flour tortilla and a corn tortilla fell in love and had a baby. They’re also crafted with coconut oil and cooked low-and-slow (Texas-style) to make them pliable and delicious.

Our grain free tortillas are approximately 6'' in diameter.

items.title: Almond Flour Tortillas - 6 Packs
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Siete Almond Flour Tortillas taste like a buttery flour tortilla. Warm them for a few seconds on a skillet or in the microwave, and you'll understand why people are flipping out over these things. Load them with salsa, meat, cheese, veggies, etc. to bring a healthy and modern flair to traditional Mexican fare.

Our grain free tortillas are approximately 6'' in diameter.

items.title: Chickpea Flour Tortillas - 6 Packs
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Opa! Like a cool breeze off the Mediterranean, our chickpea tortillas will blow you away. We made a tortilla with chickpeas and olive oil, but don't worry, it doesn't taste like a pita! Our chickpea tortilla is ultra pliable and behaves and tastes suspiciously like a flour tortilla.

Our grain free tortillas are approximately 6'' in diameter.

items.title: Dog Leash - S
items.description: What’s pawsitively essential in making dog-walking a little less ruff? That’s right! You guessed it (was it the puns or the picture that did it?)—a leash! ‘Round here, we love our pups as much as...well, anything! So we’ve taken special care to create a stylish Siete leash for your next stroll. Not only are these leashes made from recycled nylon, but just wait until you see how good it looks on your dog...WOOF!

items.title: The Garza Women's Muscle Tank - S
items.description:
Hey, girl. This one’s for you. For the days you want to get a little sun on your shoulders, comfortably flex on whatever comes your way next, and be easy, breezy, beautiful, colorful. From our family to you, a shirt that’s so soft and comfy that you can’t help but imagine that it was made for you, just like all those times you dreamt about being loving swaddled in a tortilla… Please note that although this tank is edible-level comfy, it is not, in fact, meant to be eaten. We’ve got some pretty delicious Grain Free Tortilla Chips for that.

**Women's Sizing

Sabrina is wearing size: Small.

**Unisex Sizing

Jake is wearing size: Large.

items.title: Nacho Grain Free Tortilla Chips 4oz - 8 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

We searched all of Mexico to find the perfect nacho tree, and then we picked its tantalizing fruit for our Siete Nacho Tortilla Chips. Seriously, though, let's take a second to salute Ignacio "Nacho" Anaya, inventor of the eponymous Tex-Mex staple. Nacho, you rock!

At Siete, we're kinda like an Olympic gymnast who is going for gold, we like our routines to have a high degree of difficulty, so we made our delicious cheesy Nacho flavoring without using any dairy.

For the seasoning blend, we spent hours in the kitchen getting the ratios just right and the final product is the perfect mixture of tangy, spicy, and cheesy. Smoked serrano and roasted garlic underlie the sophisticated savory flavor that provides the chips with an addictive depth.

items.title: Jalapeño Lime Grain Free Tortilla Chips 4oz - 8 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Ever wonder what the difference between “kindred love” and “kindled love” is? With our Grain Free Jalapeño Lime Tortilla Chips in hand, we think we may have uncovered a smoldering clue. With a subtle, suave heat from the jalapeño, and the tempered zest of a lime, our love grows stronger as we eat these chips, like they’ve been a part of the familia all along. Plus, the coupling of these two ingredients is second to none, as they’ve given way to margaritas and guacamole, and now these chips. And that, my friends, is what we call a “kindred, kindled kind of love.”

items.title: Ranch Grain Free Tortilla Chips 4oz - 8 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

In Texas, ranches are big deals, but ranch dressing is an even bigger deal. Ranch is the duct tape solution to every food problem. Pizza bland? Ranch. Salad dry? Ranch. Snack tray boring? Ranch. Ice cream too cold? No comment. Skin a little burnt? Stop it already, we said food problem! In celebration of ranch dressing's venerated place in the history of fine snacking, we created a dairy free (yes way!) seasoning blend of garlic, dill, parsley, and a little bit of magic that delivers the best elements of the classic dip. Giddyup, compadres!

items.title: Fuego Grain Free Tortilla Chips 4oz - 8 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

If you love spice so much that you want to marry it, then you know that sublime equilibrium when your mouth is on fire, and the only way to put out that fire is to keep adding more fire. If you're on a never-ending quest for that special moment, then these Fuego chips will be your new jam. We wrapped these chips in a Mexican blanket of our favorite chili peppers including Jalapeño and Habanero.

Be warned: these chips have a definite kick (that's the capsaicin talking to your taste buds), but we're not trying to set a new Scoville Scale record--it's a manageable heat that arrives like a friend and then stays a while. If you are the kind of person who gravitates toward words like "Flaming" and/or "Hot," then these may be your new standby snack.

items.title: Grain Free Burrito Size Tortillas - 6 packs
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Taco, nacho, queso… Turns out we sort of have a thing for foods that end in “o.” So, we thought, let’s do one better for the folks with a similar affinity and create a burrito-size tortilla! That’s right—now we’ve added “burrito” to the list! Made with cassava flour and the hopes and dreams of people wanting a tortilla big enough to wrap themselves in, this tortilla will be a game-changer. (Okay, so you might not be able to wrap yourself per se, but think of it as a sleeping bag to swaddle all your favorite burrito-fillings.)

Our grain free Burrito tortillas are approximately 10'' in diameter

items.title: Spicy Taco Seasoning - 6 pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Coming in hot to taco night with a Spicy Taco Seasoning packet that brings the flavor and the heat! Made with a savory blend of chili, tomato, cumin, and jalapeño, this seasoning has us hanging on our every bite, and singing “spice, spice, baby.”

items.title: Mild Taco Seasoning - 6 pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

When it comes to taco night, are you the type of person who likes to “take a walk on the mild side?” If so, this Mild Taco Seasoning is for you! We dialed down the heat so we could amp-up the flavor. Created with a delicate blend of tomato, garlic, chili, and cumin, we think you’ll find this one suits you just right.

items.title: Red Enchilada Sauce - 4 jars
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Since the beginning of time, humankind has been trying to bottle-up love (or, at least since 1964—remember “Love Potion Number 9,” anyone?). While we’re not here to make love potions, this Red Enchilada Sauce is sure doing the trick because we’re head over heels in love with it! Made with tomatoes, chili spice, and dates, we hope this nostalgic and hearty sauce puts the “love” into your enchila-loves. (Let us know how you like it and maybe we can retable the possibility of naming it “Love Potion Number Siete.”)

items.title: Green Enchilada Sauce - 4 jars
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

As the age-old adage goes, “the best things in life are green.” Or—even if that’s not how it goes—this bright and tangy Green Enchilada Sauce makes a strong case for our alternative interpretation. It’s made from whole vegetables like roasted tomatillos, onions, and jalapeños. Use this sauce to: give your enchiladas a zesty-bite; bring some delight to your next crockpot potluck; or bake some green goodness into breakfast chilaquiles.

items.title: Dip Chip Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz - 6 bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Ever broken your chip in a dip before? Or watched in dismay as half of your chip fell back to your loaded-nachos plate? Yeah, it’s kind of guac-ward. These grain free tortilla chips are exactly what they sound like: a thick chip built to withstand even the heartiest of dips. Made from the same savory pumpkin and cassava masa as our taco shells, but they resemble traditional restaurant-style tortilla chips. So nice, you might even dip it twice.

items.title: Familia Pack: Sea Salt Tortilla Chips 1 oz (18 bags)
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

They say the apple doesn’t fall far from the tree. And while we’ve got no official business with apples per se, we love to talk about family. So, allow us to take the apple tree analogy one step further, with the Siete Family Pack: six single-serving (1oz), miniature versions of our grain free Sea Salt tortilla chips. Like father like son, like mother like daughter, like the latter to the former, these little guys are grain free, crisp, light, and oh-so refreshing. Perfect for a picnic, school lunch, or that darndest thing some people call “portion control.” We like to think of it as our family’s way of having your family’s snack, wherever y’all roam.

items.title: Grain Free Taco Shells - 4 Pack
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

We heard you: it’s time to shift gears, take a U-turn, and arrive at the new, grain free taco shell. The texture, the crunchiness, the savory aroma, and everything loveable about hard taco shells, but with fine-tuned ingredients (cassava, pumpkin, and avocado oil), so you can still feel good firing on all four cylinders. Our new shells are the ideal vehicle for your favorite taco fillings—carne asada, pico de gallo, cotija cheese, verduras verdes! Think of it like a merge between our family Astro Van and the newest electric car; the birth of the practical, snazzy, fits-all-the-goods and emits-only-goods automobile. Perfect for getting la comida on the road, with no backseat dinner-drivers or snack stalls to speak of.

items.title: No Salt Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz  - 6 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Our no salt chips are for the purists. Perfect for those who want to test the flavor of our masa without any seasoning getting in the way or those who choose to avoid sodium!

items.title: Lime Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Everyone wants to go to paradise, but not everyone can get there. Thankfully, a bite of our lime infused chips will teleport a palm tree and a straw hat to your location. (Note: this was not replicable outside of our trip to the beach.) And even if they don't, the refreshing sensation of our tart lime seasoning will at least brighten your day. Our lime chips provide the ultimate tailgate or potluck one-up, as they are both the ideal partner to any guacamole and an undeniably zesty solo act.

items.title: Sea Salt Grain Free Tortilla Chips 5 oz - 6 Bags
items.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS

These should have been named Tortilla Chips: The Director's Cut. Our sister, Vero, made tortilla chips without any grains that taste better than any regular tortilla chip you've ever eaten. We were skeptical at first, too, but they're smooth and crispy and light and refreshing. Right when they pop out the oven, we make it rain with sea salt, so you can eat them straight out of the bag or with your favorite dip or salsa.

items.title: The Garza Hoodie (Choose Your Color) - Black / S
items.description:
Slide into the ultimate comfort of a Siete hoodie. The 52/48 (cotton/poly) blend allows us to marry ideal fluff and weight and produce a lightweight, snuggle-worthy sweatshirt. Unisex sizing.

 

Disclaimer: The extreme comfort of this hooded sweatshirt may result in receiving additional hugs.

Jeremy is wearing size: Medium.

items.title: The Garza (Women's Cut) - S
items.description:
Our latest and greatest Siete t-shirts are now available for purchase. An intense research and development process has resulted in a brand new shirt that feels like one of those old worn-in 100% cotton shirts with holes in it that you don't want to be seen in, but you can't stop wearing because it's just that comfortable. Don't wear shirts with holes in them, wear Siete. 

These shirts are perfect for: cooking a five-course meal with your family, running with the bulls in Pamplona, planting a garden, eating breakfast in bed, eating breakfast outside of bed, busting a move on the dance floor, and, of course, chowing down on some delicious grain-free tortillas. 
 
**Women's Sizing
Scarleth is wearing size: Medium.

items.title: The Garza (Unisex Cut, Choose Your Color) - S / Navy
items.description:
Our latest and greatest Siete t-shirts are now available for purchase. An intense research and development process has resulted in a brand new shirt that feels like one of those old worn-in 100% cotton shirts with holes in it that you don't want to be seen in, but you can't stop wearing because it's just that comfortable. Don't wear shirts with holes in them, wear Siete. 

These shirts are perfect for: cooking a five-course meal with your family, running with the bulls in Pamplona, planting a garden, eating breakfast in bed, eating breakfast outside of bed, busting a move on the dance floor, and, of course, chowing down on some delicious grain-free tortillas. 

**Unisex Sizing
Kartik, Matt, and Trevor are wearing size: Medium.
